title: Best of The Program | 4/5/21
description:
Hunter Biden finally talked about his infamous laptop and gave every excuse imaginable. How well is the vaccine rollout going? "60 Minutes" was caught intentionally editing a press conference with Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis to make him look bad for allowing Publix to distribute vaccines. Cops showed up at a Canadian pastor’s church to enforce mask rules on Easter Sunday, and the response has gone viral.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
